thread.title: EzTimesheet Attendance Tracker Now Makes It Easy to Track Contractors
thread.title_full: EzTimesheet Attendance Tracker Now Makes It Easy to Track Contractors

author: PRWEB
title: EzTimesheet Attendance Tracker Now Makes It Easy to Track Contractors
text:
Eztimesheet attendance tracker gives businesses an easy way to track summer contractors. Houston, TX (PRWEB) July 17, 2015
Business owners utilizing the latest version of EzTimeSheet time tracker from Halfpricseoft.com are now able to track summer contractors more easily. In addition to tracking contractors, companies can track overtime, vacation, and sick time. EzTimesheet will also allow businesses to review, modify and keep track of employees time effortlessly.
“Eztimesheet attendance tracker gives businesses an easy way to track summer contractors,” Halfpricesoft.com founder, Dr. Ge says.
Managing employee time and attendance data can be overwhelming and time-consuming. As a business owner, there are few things more valuable than a tool that puts more hours back into the day and saves money that can be re-invested into the business.
ezTimesheet software handles regular, overtime, sick and vacation payment. It will automate the time tracking and payroll process. Customers can use it as PC punch clock software and install on multiple machines to enter time manually.
Customers can use the employee attendance data for business analysis, including scheduling and other essential day-to-day functions.
ezTimeSheet is easy to use and doesn’t require a background in accounting or computers. Despite its extreme usability, ezTimeSheet delivers great diversity in features to meet the needs of today’s business environment.
This time clock software is compatible with Windows 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, 2003 and XP. Halfpricesoft.com developers are encouraging employers and HR manager to download this new version and try it free from http://www.halfpricesoft.com/time-tracking-time-sheet-download.asp with no obligation.
ezTimesheet reduces payroll costs. Due to overlapping time clock entries, the average employer overpay is 2.5%. ezTimeSheet eliminates this problem.
Application saves customers time. The program calculates time and gross pay automatically, preventing the need for owners or administrators to complete the task.
This software will add value to the business. Customers can use the employee attendance data for business analysis, including scheduling and other essential day-to-day functions.
Business owners who hate to track employee attendance manually and get overwhelmed by accounting and payroll headaches, can learn more about ezTimeSheet software at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/time-sheet-tracking-software.asp
About halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software needs of small businesses around the world with its payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check printing software, W2/1099 software and bar-code generating software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
